name: TaxGPT
headline: AI tax assistant for professionals and businesses
description: TaxGPT AI co-pilot for accountants and tax professionals increases tax firm's productivity and profitability by 10x by automating tax research, client communication, onboarding flows and secure document collection.

founders.name: Kashif Ali, Co-founder and CEO
founders.description:
Automating tax filing at TaxGPT.com
Previously worked for Adobe & WSJ.

founders.name: Isabella Maceda-Ali, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder & CTO of TaxGPT
UC Berkeley Alum
Focused on A.I. in Fintech

### Loved by over 30,000 professionals, businesses, and individuals alike
Tax Professionals
## AI tax co-pilot for research, writing and document analysis
Cut down tax research time by 99% with your personalized AI tax assistant. Get answers to complex tax questions, draft tax memos, analyze over 1,000 tax forms and more. Make your tax workflows faster, easier, and smarter.
Research
Memo writing
Client profiles
Reduce errors
Save time
[For Tax Firms](https://www.taxgpt.com/</tax-professional-copilot-for-accountants>)[For Businesses](https://www.taxgpt.com/</ai-tax-assistant-for-businesses>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/661ff9b7c00e059c1adbb000/67a271771e5f0a43a0ae58de_home-principal.png)
Individuals
## Embed TaxGPT into your workflows
Revolutionize the way you handle taxes with our AI-powered chatbot. Integrate our AI tax advisor into any workflow to deliver a simple and user-friendly experience for your customers. Reduce client response times by 10x and boost customer satisfaction today.
[Learn more](https://www.taxgpt.com/</tax-lead-generation>)
![Integrate TaxGPT onto your website](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/661ff9b7c00e059c1adbb000/66c320c6d92156f5e16a8cd8_embed_bot.png)
### As seen on
[](https://www.taxgpt.com/<https:/www.axios.com/pro/fintech-deals/2025/02/06/ai-tax-assistant-taxgpt-seed>)[](https://www.taxgpt.com/<https:/youtu.be/uMajFsCkzxY?list=PLn5MTSAqaf8peDZQ57QkJBzewJU1aUokl&t=1780>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/661ff9b7c00e059c1adbb000/67a50bf2ec25f9fa3cfea167_jason.png)](https://www.taxgpt.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q5-jHoV19-I&t=7s>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/661ff9b7c00e059c1adbb000/67a50ba4e9c94ebc76cbd5ca_this_week.png)](https://www.taxgpt.com/<https:/youtu.be/XUiVHgSUvcw?t=3444>)[](https://www.taxgpt.com/<https:/youtu.be/lbJilIQhHko?t=1278>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/661ff9b7c00e059c1adbb000/67a50a1f0af03c4f322a6760_h_garcia.jpg)Hector Garcia CPA](https://www.taxgpt.com/<https:/youtu.be/6c2BzVERV5s?t=712>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/661ff9b7c00e059c1adbb000/67a5104054cb982e1dedb633_taxgpt.png)](https://www.taxgpt.com/<https:/www.taxgpt.com/blog/taxgpt-raises-4-6m-to-build-the-first-ai-tax-co-pilot-for-accounting-and-tax-firms>)
Get started in less than 5 minutes
### Key features
### Accurate answers
Powered by our proprietary AI model trained on millions of documents, tax laws, and CPA-verified sources, TaxGPT delivers up-to-date answers to even the most complex tax questions.
### Secure and confidential
Data security is at the core of what we do. We recognize the importance of protecting sensitive tax information. That‚Äôs why we secure all your data using industry-leading standards and trusted platforms like AWS and Azure.
### Tailored responses
Say goodbye to one-size-fits-all tax advice. TaxGPT provides automated responses tailored to your tax situation, helping you identify eligible deductions, avoid overpaying taxes, and stay compliant.
### Draft communications
With TaxGPT, you can quickly draft tax memos, respond to IRS notices, and handle client communications, streamlining your workflow and saving valuable time.
### Saves time
No more endlessly searching on the internet or relying on outdated information. TaxGPT delivers instant, accurate answers to your tax questions, saving you thousands of hours with tax compliance.
### Customers love us
This app is fantastic so far. I needed special research on Section 174 for both the film industry and for an SBIR grantee and got some great responses and solid links for more info. Game changer. Look out big fish...the small fish are about to get you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/661ff9b7c00e059c1adbb000/66cc76d88a9cc15708d74424_jackie.jpg)

CPA, CTC, CGMA
This tool is providing invaluable assistance as I work with clients who have numerous questions. I always strive to offer top-tier support, and this tool is going to be a tremendous help.

CPA

generated_description:
**TaxGPT: Revolutionizing Tax Assistance with AI**

Founded in 2023 and based in San Francisco, TaxGPT has quickly emerged as a vital player in the fintech landscape, particularly aimed at accountants and tax professionals. As a part of Y Combinator Batch S24, this company has set its sights on transforming tax-related processes through its innovative AI-powered platform. 

**Mission and Vision**
The mission of TaxGPT is straightforward yet ambitious: to provide an intelligent AI tax assistant that enhances productivity and profitability for tax firms and businesses by a staggering 10x. By automating essential tasks such as tax research, client communication, onboarding, and secure document collection, TaxGPT serves as a co-pilot for professionals navigating the intricate world of taxes.

**Functionality and Impact**
TaxGPT offers several key features aimed at streamlining tax-related workflows:
- **For Tax Firms**: It drives productivity gains with automated tax research, allowing accountants to save significant time and reduce potential errors.
- **For Businesses**: The platform provides a 24/7 smart tax assistant that simplifies tax management and filing processes.
- **Integration Options**: TaxGPT can be seamlessly embedded into existing workflows, improving client communication and response times.

The platform is already trusted by over 30,000 users, including CPAs and tax professionals who testify to its efficiency in reducing research time and the complexity of tax tasks.

**Team and Leadership**
With a compact team of 11 employees, the company is positioned for rapid growth under the leadership of Garry Tan as their Group Partner. The small, agile team allows for a focus on innovation and responsive development, ensuring that they can swiftly adapt to the needs of their clientele.

**Website and Engagement**
For those interested in leveraging TaxGPT‚Äôs capabilities, the company‚Äôs website (https://www.taxgpt.com) offers a free 14-day trial, alongside a wealth of resources such as blogs, an answer library, and comprehensive security measures to protect sensitive information.

In conclusion, TaxGPT is not just another tech startup; it embodies potential for the future of tax consultancy. By integrating AI into ordinary tax tasks, it stands to not only improve efficiency but also redefine the role of tax professionals in the digital age. If you're looking to take your tax processes to new heights, TaxGPT might just be the co-pilot you need.
